adjectives.description: becalmed (comparative more becalmed, superlative most becalmed)

entries.meaning: (nautical, of a sailing ship) Unable to move due to lack of wind.
examples: […]  when we got aſterne we grew becalm'd, land-lockt in a fort, and were ſported all the way  […]

entries.meaning: simple past tense and past participle of becalm
